name: Gardens Inc. 4 - Blooming Stars
description:
Enjoy Gardens Inc. 4 Blooming Stars! An amazing gardening game that gives you the perfect combination of an exciting story and diverse gameplay. Yes, this game not only has challenging time management features, but you'll also enjoy resource management ánd hidden object elements. While creating gorgeous gardens, you'll go on an adventure with super gardeners Jill & Mike. In Gardens Inc. 4 they get their own TV show and to raise money for charity, they have to complete 45 assignments in 100 days. The clock is ticking, because Jill is pregnant, and difficulty increases with many obstacles. As they fight off thieves and unwanted animals, things keep going wrong... Is it a coincidence, or are they being sabotaged? Join Jill & Mike's adventure, help them overcome all the obstacles, and create gorgeous gardens!

The first 10 levels are free, with an in-game purchase available to unlock the full game with all locations.

PLAY GARDENS INC. 4 BLOOMING STARS and create beautiful gardens all around the world
JOIN JILL & MIKE on a super exciting TV adventure and help them complete all challenges
FINISH ALL 45 LEVELS and get 10 bonus levels
MANAGE TIME, RESOURCES, and enjoy hidden object elements
ENJOY DIVERSE GAMEPLAY, clear the path, gather resources, and plant flowers to create the most stunning gardens ever
OVERCOME OBSTACLES like thieves, pests, and wild animals
DECORATE the baby room for Jill & Mike's baby
ENJOY COIN FRENZY, use security guards and animal catchers to scare away wolves or burglars
